page.title: 16The Church of Saint Maurice.
page.content: There has been a church in Eglingham since Saxon times. Recently someone came and, by dousing,found the outline of the first Saxon church. We praise God in our church. Sometimes my Daddy, the Vicar, does special services for children when we have film-slides, or act little plays from the Bible. On Sundays there is a service at 8.00 or 10.15 a.m. Sometimes people go to church to pray during the week. Many ladies clean the church and put flowers in it.Some men have mended the wall because it was old and crumbling. We had a day called "Living in the Light" recently when a lot of people came from as far away as Edinburgh and Durham to dance sing and play guitars. The Bishop came to talk too. We had a meal in the Hall afterwards. My sister plays guitar in church sometimes with her friends. They played at a wedding.
